directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Roll dough out on lightly floured surface to thickness of 1/8 inch. Fit into 10-inch pie pan or quiche dish. Trim and finish edges. Using electric mixer, cream butter and sugar. Beat in eggs 1 at a time. Blend in half and half and vanilla. Stir in chocolate chips and pecans. Pour into crust. Bake 30 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 300 degrees F and continue baking until pie is set, about 50 minutes. Cool; pie will fall. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)
Spoon whipped cream into a pastry bag fitted with star tip. Pipe rosettes of whipped cream around edge of pie. Garnish with chocolate shavings.
ingredients: 3 cups firmly packed golden brown sugar
title: Chocolate Chip Butterscotch Pie
